titleStmt.title: Uma Eleição Perdida: Edição para o ELTeC
titleStmt.author: Ficalho, Francisco Manuel de Melo Breyner, Conde de (1837-1903)

respStmt.resp: Codificação segundo as normas do ELTeC
respStmt.name: Diana Santos

publicationStmt.p: Adicionado à coleção ELTeC 18 de junho de 2020.

encodingDesc.p: The information for level 2 (tokenisation, sentence separation, lemmatisation, morphological analysis and named entity recognition) was performed by the PALAVRAS parser, with some post conversion for UD-features and ELTeC requirements.
